name: crossfilter-multigroup
description: A specialized Crossfilter group for handling dimensions that are lists

scripts.build: echo "`./banner.sh`\n`babel --modules umd $npm_package_main`" > dist/$npm_package_name.js && uglifyjs --compress --comments '/license/i' -- dist/$npm_package_name.js > dist/$npm_package_name.min.js

author: Rob Brackett
